title: Household emotional labor and relationship maintenance
description: Household emotional labor and relationship maintenance
content:
Scenario: Household emotional labor and relationship maintenance
    Given Sarah remembers birthdays, maintains family connections
    And she manages emotional climate and resolves conflicts
    When the household_elohim tracks emotional labor
    Then it should recognize relationship maintenance as valuable work
    And it should track conflict resolution, emotional support, connection-building
    And emotional labor should be valued as heavily as physical labor
    And Sarah's work maintaining family emotional health should be visible
    And the partner should see this typically invisible labor
    And household care economy should value all forms of care
